title: FG and IPOB protesters
text:
Alleged $10m diversion: Clear yourself, APC tells Okowa Sayogbemi 
I will not be surprised if people, most especially his relatives and political colleagues claimed that this lawyer was charmed. The truth is that there are lot of Nigerians working about with “vertical sickness”, diabetics and hypertension fall into this category. The latter can be triggered by quantitative or qualitative overload leading to sudden death as witnessed in this sad event. Thus, regular medical check up is necessary with exercise and decent recreation to stop a “vertical sickness” progressing to “horizontal sickness” (stroke) or death. May The Lord God console the wife children and relatives he left behind. Amen. ubacom
